name: Fiona
description: A powerful Executor and an outstanding Archon.

set.2: After dealing damage, increase attack by **16%**/18%/20%/22% for {4 seconds. This effect does not stack. Only the effect with the highest star rating is applied when obtained repeatedly.
set.4: While Benediction Resonance is not active, after using Scatter Technique, increase final damage by **17%**/19%/21%/23% for {4 seconds. While Benediction Resonance is active, after using Scatter Technique, increase final damage for self and teammates by **8.5%**/9.5%/10.5%/11.5% for {9 seconds. Final damage is additionally increased based on base attack by (Base ATK/10,000)%, up to 5%. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
